document_data.caption: Lord Yuvaraj riding a dragon into battle
document_data.name: Yuvaraj
document_data.Relationships: He rode a [[copper dragon]] into battle.
document_data.Possessions: He wore the ''First [[Imaskarcana]]'' as his crown, while wielding a fabled tome of the same set of artifacts, probably the ''[[Third Imaskarcana|Third]]''.
document_data.History: During the battle the final confrontation between the [[Imaskari]] and the [[Mulan]] and their deities in {{Yearlink|-2488}}, he fell in battle with the deity [[Horus-Re|Horus]] at the palace of [[Inupras]].
